name: Dispatch 38
description:
Created in a week for the OST GAME JAM, this game was inspired by the music of many of the artists who submitted their tracks for the competition. The initial idea was inspired directly by awwbree with the song - Terminal Lover. 

https://2hac.bandcamp.com/track/terminal-lover

As I built the game I listened to many of the songs and included all the ones I thought would suit the game. There are 19 tracks in the game and all track names and titles are displayed in the game world. 

You are a Dispatch Agent responsible for routing large cargo space ships to their destinations. Make the right choices and save some lives along the way. 

Controls are learned in game

This game is both for VR and Standard PC game platforms. 

Use motion controllers to play in VR

Use Keyboard to play on standard mode.

*** UPDATED TO FIX CRASH BUG ***

Although the point of the game is to learn as you go, to get you started, here are some controls. 

ARROW KEYS - Move Camera

K - Change monitor view

< and > - Change Music Tracks

Many thanks to the wonderful musicians who contributed. 

Tracks included are - 

  • awwbree - Terminal Lover After the War - Inevitable 
  • BackspinZX - Data Corruption 
  • Caiou - now in the 20s you can even abstractionaut through your phone 
  • Calamity Range - Edge of Attention 
  • CP_r - Moody Doom Shoes 
  • Deku-P - Lost in the Deep 
  • Don't B Flat - Progress 
  • Isiah Brighton - Discord 
  • Jank Hambrams - I Feel Like I Fell Asleep in a Cement Mixer 
  • Keynan McFedries - Sapphire Fields 
  • Pandora's Robin - From the Beginning 
  • panegoism - I Dream in 56k Colour 
  • Peter Chang - Xenon 
  • Pohy - Water them 
  • QRV - COOL_SONG_FINAL
  • Sara Garrard - piano player player piano 
  • Shanahan Sweet - Basin 
  • Track - Digital Forest 
  • Whelp - Good Night Technology
